posts.title: Chelsea vs Nottingham forest
posts.description: What is Chelsea's biggest ever away defeat in history? Chelsea's biggest away defeat is by six goals. It's happened three times in history - an 8-1 loss to Wolverhampton Wanderers during the 1953/1954 season, and 7-0 defeats to Leeds United (1967/68) and Nottingham Forest (1990/91).

posts.title: milan vs inter
posts.description: Trupa lui Simone Inzaghi urmează să dea piept în ultimul act cu învingătoarea dublei manșe dintre Manchester City și Real Madrid. În tur, pe Santiago Bernabeu, a fost 1-1, iar totul se va decide pe Etihad.

posts.title: real vs man city
posts.description: Is Barcelona better than Manchester City? Currently Manchester City has a better 1vs1 performance index with 100. Barcelona has 53 goals and Manchester City has a total of 78 goals. Our opinion is that currently Manchester City would win the match.

posts.title: chelsea vs man city
posts.description:
Chelsea Fixture

In the Stamford Bridge, the two teams played a total of 14 games before, of which Manchester City won 6, Chelsea won 6 and the two teams drew 2. In the EFL Cup, the two teams played a total of 2 games before, of which Manchester City won 1, Chelsea won 0 and the two teams drew 1.
